task_description: Generate PSYC100 study site content: Create structured JSON notes and MCQ questions for 11 weeks using pre-extracted content analysis from Phase 1. Input: workspace documents with key concepts, theories, learning objectives for all topics.

phases.name: Structured Notes Generation
phases.description: Create comprehensive JSON notes for each of 11 weeks matching study-site format
deliverables: Each contains: week, dateRange, topics array with title, summary, keyTakeaways, content sections
Content formatted with headings, paragraphs, lists, callouts
Use extracted content from .agent-workspace/TASK-20260113-132732-7d7996c7/ as source
success_criteria: Valid JSON syntax for all files

phases.name: Question Bank Generation
phases.description: Generate 15+ MCQs per week testing key concepts
deliverables: Minimum 15 MCQs added to each weekly JSON
Questions array with question, options (4 choices), answer fields
Mix of recall, application, analysis questions
Questions cover theories, definitions, researchers, applications

phases.name: Integration & Deployment
phases.description: Integrate JSON files into study-site, update courseData.json, validate and test

phases.name: Final Testing
phases.description: Comprehensive testing of all implemented features. This phase uses chrome-devtools MCP for browser testing, curl for API tests, and runs any existing test suites.
deliverables: All UI features tested via browser automation
All API endpoints tested via curl/integration tests
No critical bugs or regressions found
success_criteria: API responses are correct and performant

task_context.background_context: Phase 1 COMPLETED in previous task (TASK-20260113-132732-7d7996c7). Deliverables in workspace: PHASE1_COURSE_STRUCTURE_COMPREHENSIVE_MAPPING.md (957 lines), individual week analyses (4249 lines total), JSON structure samples. Source: pdf-text-extracted/*.txt (11 files). Target format: study-site/src/data/weeks/week1.json structure.
constraints: All JSON must be valid syntax
relevant_files: pdf-text-extracted/PSYC100 GENERAL PSYCHOLOGY TREATMENTS AND THERAPIES.txt
